title: Blank screen leave
body: Why the f%$k did i get a leave when the game it self would not alowe me to enter the match after i was in the champion select

replies.body: Black screen are usually due to your network having a problem staying connected to the game server.  Go over our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) which will provide some steps to get this fixed up.  Hopefully you won't have this issue afterwards, but let me know if you have any questions!
